Title: Osun: Aregbesola vows to deny Adeleke second term
Summary: The interim National Secretary of the African Democratic Congress (ADC), Rauf Aregbesola, has vowed to oust the incumbent Governor . Adeleke is the current Governor of Osun .

Title: Buhari: What world leaders are saying
Summary: Buhari, who led his country first as a junta head and later as an elected democrat, died Sunday at the age of 75 . Buhar led his nation first as junta leader and later became elected democrat . World leaders have joined the Nigerian Government and the family of Muhammadu Buhara in mourning the former president

Title: FG begins recruitment into Immigration, Civil Defense, others today
Summary: Federal Government opens recruitment portal for Nigeria Immigration Service, Nigerian Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC), Federal Fire Service, and Nigeria Correctional Service . The recruitment portal was initially scheduled to commence on June 26 .

Title: Buhari served Nigeria with integrity – Northern elders
Summary: The Northern Elders Forum (NEF) expressed sorrow and a deep sense of national loss . NEF Spokesperson, Professor Abubakar Jika Jiddere, described the late General Buhari as a good man .

Title: We’ll remember Buhari for his fatherly role – Ohanaeze Ndigbo
Summary: Igbo socio-cultural organisation, Ohanaeze Ndigbo, mourns the passage of the immediate past President Muhammadu Buhari . It stated that the history of Nigeria would be incomplete without the role played by the former President .

Title: Southern Senators mourn passing of Oba Sikiru Adetona, Awujale of Ijebuland
Summary: Oba Sikiru Kayode Adetona, the Awujale and Paramount Ruler of Ijebuland, died at the age of 91 . The Southern Senators Forum (SSF) has expressed deep sorrow over the passing of Oba .

Title: Businessman docked for allegedly stealing N120m worth of soap
Summary: Uchenna Nnaji has been arraigned before the Lagos State High Court, sitting in Tafawa Balewa Square, over allegations of conspiracy and theft involving cartons of soap valued at N120 million .

Title: Buhari: APC shuts down national secretariat
Summary:
Buhari died at 82 in London on Sunday after an undisclosed illness.

Title: Neighbours recall Buhari’s humility, generosity, discipline
Summary: Neighbours recall Buhari’s humility, generosity, discipline . The neighbours said the late president remained deeply connected to his community throughout his life .

Title: Man dies in suspected cult shooting in Ogun
Summary: A violent clash between two rival cult groups in the Atan-Ota area of Ogun State has left a man dead . Bashiru Saidu, believed to be a member of the Eiye Confraternity, was attacked and fatally shot by four gunmen who arrived on two motorcycles on Sunday night .

Title: NMDPRA cuts fuel smuggling by 35% — DAPPMAN
Summary: In a statement signed by Executive Secretary of DAPPMAN, Olufemi Adewole on Monday, the association attributed the “stability, innovation, energy access and continuing growth“ in the sector to what it called strategic regulatory oversight by the NMDPRA .

Title: Can Garri cause blindness? Aproko Doctor explains risk
Summary: Nigerian social media health influencer and medical doctor, Chinonso Egemba, has warned that poorly processed Garri could potentially lead to blindness due to the presence of harmful substances in cassava, its raw material . Garri contains compounds known as cyanogenic glycosides—specifically linamarin and lotaustralin .

Title: Pastor Bakare mourns Awujale, says monarch brokered APC formation
Summary: Pastor Tunde Bakare has paid tribute to the late Awujale and paramount ruler of Ijebuland, Oba Sikiru Kayode Adetona . He described him as “a patriot, mentor and elder statesman” whose death marked the end of an era in Nigeria’s political and cultural

Title: Buhari's life epitomised 'dedication, incorruptible service’, say Northern elders
Summary: The Northern Elders Forum expressed ‘profound sorrow and a deep sense of national loss’ The Forum acknowledged the collective grief felt by the nation and extended heartfelt condolences to the Buhari family and the Government and People of the Federal Republic of Nigeria .
